products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash rosewood pink roller blind in pink. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stunning rosewood pink roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This pink roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2070 fabric colour: rosewood pink material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.productdescription:

This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please.
This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Their roller blinds are value for money and easy to install.
For ease of mind, all their products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the yorkshire textile homeland, swift direct blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.

products.title: Splash Flamingo Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash flamingo pink roller blind in pink. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash flamingo pink is a beautiful bright pink shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash flamingo pink roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash rosewood pink electric roller blind in pink. Made to measure from 133.32 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. 
 
 This splash rosewood pink electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The dusty rosewood pink of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
